entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Norway House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Norway House Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
